categories: Category:Sith Lords of the reconstituted Sith Empire

nodes.text: Darth Pharov was a female Sith Pureblood who served the reconstituted Sith Empire during the Third Galactic War. She participated and died in the Invasion of Ossus.
Darth Pharov first appeared in Patch 5.10.0 "Jedi Under Siege" of Star Wars: The Old Republic as a hostile NPC on the Republic side with the title "Imperial Commander".
